<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gossip's Eye](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2158)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 108 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 30 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These discrete prosthetics have been the secret behind more than a few salacious rumors getting out among Taldan high society. This functions like a [_magical prosthetic eye_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2156), but with an added benefit.

<document level="2" id="action-1658" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
